message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1400000. This is a fair price considering its value to you.  Let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $1350000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your position. While I'm willing to negotiate,  $1350000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1375000.  This price still leaves room for both of us to be satisfied. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I believe $1360000 would be a fair price. I hope this proposal will lead to a satisfactory outcome for both of us.
